data.title: PADRES ON DECK: Ethan Salas Homers; Pitchers Jagger Haynes, Omar Cruz Sharp
data.meta_description: Catcher Ethan Salas (.191), the Padres’ №1 prospect, his a 3-run, game-winning home run in four at-bats Tuesday night for High Single-A Fort Wayne. Left-handed starter Jagger Haynes, the Padres’ №12…
data.text:
Catcher Ethan Salas (.191), the Padres’ №1 prospect, his a 3-run, game-winning home run in four at-bats Tuesday night for High Single-A Fort Wayne.

Left-handed starter Jagger Haynes, the Padres’ №12 prospect, gave up two runs on six hits and no walks with six strikeouts over six innings to lower his earned run average with Fort Wayne to 4.08. Right-hander Miguel Castro (3.60 ERA) allowed a hit with a strikeout in a scoreless inning to earn his eighth save.

Left-hander Omar Cruz, the Padres’ №28 prospect, allowed one run on a hit and three walks with four strikeouts in 5 2/3 innings of relief for Triple-A El Paso to lower his ERA to 2.84.

It was not such a good night for right-handed starter Victor Lizarraga (4–6, 4.19 ERA. The Padres’ №5 prospect gave up eight runs (seven earned) on six hits and three walks with two strikeouts in 2 1/3 innings for Double-A San Antonio.

Shortstop Leodalis De Vries (.231) was 1-for-4 with a run scored for Single-A Lake Elsinore.

AROUND THE FARM:

TRIPLE-A EL PASO (44–65) — SUGAR LAND 2, Chihuahuas 1: SS Mason McCoy (.244) was 2-for-3 with a RBI. DH Cal Mitchell (.272) had a double in 4 at-bats with a run scored. CF Jose Azocar (.298) was 1-for-4. RH Jhony Brito (0–2, 9.00 ERA) started in front of Cruz and gave up a run on a hit and 3 walks with a strikeout in 1/3rd of an inning to take the loss. LH Paul Fry (4.72) issued a BB with a K in an otherwise perfect IP. RH Lake Bachar (3.86) gave up a hit with 2 Ks in a scoreless IP.

DOUBLE-A SAN ANTONIO (15–18, 46–55) — SPRINGFIELD 11, Missions 0: CF Connor Hollis (.227) had a double in 4 at-bats. C Michael De La Cruz (.205) was 1-for-3. RH Raul Brito (3.49 ERA) followed Lizarraga and gave up a hit with 3 strikeouts in 3 2/3 scoreless innings. LH Jason Blanchard (4.00) gave up a run on 2 hits and a walk with a K in an IP. RH Robert Milacki (3.19) gave up 2 runs on 3 hits with a K in an IP.

SINGLE-A FORT WAYNE (13–23; 41–62) — TinCaps 5, SOUTH BEND 2: SS Nik McClaughry (.168) hit a 2-run double in 4 at-bats behind Salas. LF Nick Vogt (.222) was 1-for-2 with 2 walks and a run scored. 1B Ethan Long wsas 1-for-4 with a stolen base and a run scored in his Fort Wayne debut. RF Kai Murphy (.233) was 1-for-5. 2B Nerwillian Cedeno (.198) was 0-for-2 with 2 walks, a stolen base and a run. RH Jose Geraldo (3–1, 5.34 ERA) followed Haynes and gave up a hit and a walk with a strikeout in 2 scoreless innings to earn the win.

SINGLE-A LAKE ELSINORE (20–17, 52–49) — Storm 6, STOCKTON 3: RF Braedon Karpathios (.225) was 2-for-4 with a double, a stolen base and 2 RBIs behind De Vries. CF Kai Roberts was 2-for-4 with a walk and a run scored in his Storm debut. 2B Brandon Butterworth had a double in 3 at-bats with a walk, a RBI and a run in his debut. LF Ryan Wilson (.221) was 1-for-3 with a walk, a stolen base and a RBI. C Brendan Durfee was 1-for-4 with a sacrifice fly in his debut. 1B Jack Costello was 0-for-3 with a walk, a sacrifice fly and a run scored in his debut. DH B.Y. Choi (.238) was 0-for-3 with 2 walks and 2 runs. Starting LH Luis Gutierrez (2–2, 6.00 ERA) gave up a run on 3 hits and 3 walks with 6 strikeouts in 5 1/3 innings to earn the win. RH Luis German (5.79) gave up 2 runs on 2 hits and 3 BBs with a K in 1 2/3 IPs. RH Miguel Valdez (3.60) allowed a hit and a BB with a K in 2 scoreless IPs to earn his first save.

ARIZONA COMPLEX LEAGUE PADRES (24–36) — Season completed.

DOMINICAN SUMMER LEAGUE PADRES GOLD (21–24) — GOLD 1, Astros 0: The Gold won despite going hitless. Starting RH Manuel Davila (2.79 ERA) gave up 4 hits and no walks with 6 strikeouts in 6 scoreless innings. RH Dionicio Nova (2–2, 5.23) issued a walk in a hitless, scoreless IP to earn the win

DOMINICAN SUMMER LEAGUE PADRES BROWN (13–33) — Brown 4–3, DIAMONDBACKS 1–7: C Dayquer Alfonzo (.308) was 2-for-3 with 2 RBIs. 3B Juan Martinez (.227) was 2-for-6 with a double, a hit-by-pitch a RBI and a run scored. DH Jason Hernandez was 2-for-2 with 3 stolen bases and a run scored. SS Endy Rios was 1-for-3 with 2 RBIs and a run. SS Eduarlin Tejada (.218) was 1-for-3 with a RBI.PH-DH Isaac Ponce (.244) was 1-for-2 with a RBI. Starting RH Edinson Hernandez (1–3, 8.64 ERA) allowed an unearned run on 4 hits and 4 walks with 4 strikeouts in 5 innings to earn the win.
